descript.abstract: This dataset represents the county boundaries, as recognized by the Minnesota Department of Transportation. There are 87 counties in Minnesota.
descript.purpose: The purpose of this dataset is to spatially represent the county boundaries and use as reference for other layers spatially dependent on county boundaries (ex. ATP boundaries).

browse.browsed: PDF file of County Index Map, which is linked to detailed county maps

idinfo.useconst: This dataset is best suited for general reference only. It is not suitable for precise land measurements or ground surveys.

timeperd.current: Data is published weekly to the GeoCommons, but maybe maintained on a different cycle. Open package to review specific layer for more detail.

cntinfo.cntpos: Section Director of OTSM Roadway Data and Supportd

dataqual.logic: Topology Rules for: Gaps, Overlaps, Covered By State

horizpa.horizpar: All of the data sources reviewed and the final dataset were within the National Map Accuracy Standards for 1:24,000-scale maps which is +/- 40 feet (12 meters). The dataset is not intended for legal land survey use, and is best suited for general reference.

procstep.procdesc: This dataset was originally developed by the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources, then adjusted by MnDOT staff to match county boundaries more accurately using high resolution imagery, USGS boundary interpretations, and interpretations from local sources.

attr.attrdef: Unique numeric identification code assigned to counties
Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) 55 is a 3-digit feature identification number for geographic names and is a part of the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS).
Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) is a 6-digit ifeature identification code for geographic names.

distinfo.distliab: USE OF THIS DOCUMENT IS SUBJECT TO MNDOT'S DISCLAIMERS, LEGAL NOTICES AND POLICIES FOUND at http://www.dot.state.mn.us/information/disclaimer.html

stdorder.ordering: The data may be requested from the Contact person listed in the metadata.

cntinfo.cntpos: Section Director of OTSM Roadway Data and Supportd
